translations.name: New Bible Translation
translations.description: The New Bible (NBV) is a translation of the Bible into contemporary Dutch. It is an inter-confessional translation which is to say it is intended for use by any Christian denomination. It was published by the Dutch Bible Society and the Catholic Bible Foundation (KBS) in 2004. Since then, there have been more than a million copies sold.
